images.title: Colin Chambers / Woodland track above Brodick Castle
images.caption: Woodland track above Brodick Castle. This track is part of the Hydro Dam Trail above Brodick Castle. Although the OS 1:50,000 mapping shows this part of the track in NS0138, the 1:25,000 mapping and GPS both indicate that it crosses into this square.

images.title: Alisdair Mclean / Alpine Garden Brodick Castle
images.caption: Alpine Garden Brodick Castle

description: Explore this stunning country park on the Isle of Arran on this walk in Scotland. There are miles of trails taking you to landscaped gardens, woodland, wildlife ponds, waterfalls and coastline, all set against the backdrop of Goatfell mountain. If you'd like to continue your walking in the area then you could climb Goatfell for fabulous views over Arran. At the castle you can also pick up the Arran Coastal Way and explore the whole coastline of the island. The 66 mile route is classified as one of Scotland's Great Trails.
